otherNames: Matchless Emperor, The Greatest Emperor, Unrivalled Emperor, Cái Thế Đế Tôn, Emperor Gaishi, 盖世帝尊, 蓋世の帝尊
synopsis: A worthless youth with the title of ‘sleeping god’ had unlocked an outlandish martial arts from a blessing in disguise. From then on, a genius with incomparable strength, crushes the heavens and the earth, and split the stars with his sword, all other geniuses trembles at his feet.
